paragraphList.text: P2Peek is a peer-to-peer communication application with built-in steganography and encryption, offering a secure alternative to traditional chat apps.
Messages can be embedded inside image containers using LSB steganography, and the resulting image is encrypted before transmission.
Includes features like user whitelisting, blacklisting, profile-based access control, and an admin dashboard for session monitoring.
Developed using Python for backend logic and WebSockets for real-time communication. Available in both native and web formats.
Phishing Link Finder is a cybersecurity tool designed to detect and flag potential phishing URLs in real-time using heuristic patterns and URL analysis.
It incorporates blacklisted domain checks, fuzzy matching with known phishing domains, and detection of suspicious URL encoding techniques.
This tool is ideal for security analysts and email gateways to pre-scan links in inbound messages, significantly reducing the risk of social engineering attacks.
Built with Python and Flask for the backend API and uses a custom-trained machine learning model for enhanced phishing probability scoring.
Subdomain Finder is a reconnaissance tool that helps ethical hackers discover hidden or forgotten subdomains of a given domain.
It scrapes data from multiple open-source intelligence (OSINT) sources like crt.sh, VirusTotal, and DNSDumpster, and also supports brute-force mode.
Designed for pentesters and bug bounty hunters, this tool assists in uncovering potential attack surfaces during security assessments.
Built in Python with asynchronous requests to achieve fast enumeration, it also supports output in CSV/JSON format for integration with other tools.
An AI-powered transcriber that converts speech to text in real-time, optimized for meetings, lectures, and interviews.
Integrates Whisper by OpenAI for high-accuracy speech recognition, with support for multiple languages and dialects.
The tool can automatically detect speakers, remove filler words, and generate clean, timestamped transcripts.
Supports upload of audio files or live microphone input and exports transcripts in DOCX, TXT, and PDF formats.
A Gemini-powered AI tool that automates medical coding from clinical scenarios, extracting ICD-10-CM, CPT, and HCPCS codes.
Users enter patient case descriptions, and the app intelligently identifies diagnoses, procedures, and relevant medical terminology.
Built with Vite + ReactJS and styled with custom components for a clean and intuitive UI.
Uses Google Generative AI (Gemini Flash 2.0) to interpret natural language and return structured medical codes in JSON format.
Deployed on Vercel with environmental variable protection for secure API key management.
Not open source; proprietary solution aimed at supporting medical coders, practitioners, and healthcare data analysts.
Live site available at: https://medical-coding-assist.vercel.app/
A secure web app that scans uploaded files for malware using ClamAV antivirus engine integrated with an Express.js backend.
Features a ReactJS frontend allowing users to upload files and get real-time scan results with an intuitive UI.
Backend is containerized with Docker, ensuring easy deployment and isolated ClamAV scanning environment.
Designed for quick detection of malicious files to protect systems from potential threats during file uploads.

portfolioData.title: Sustainable EV Optimizer
portfolioData.subTitle: Route and Battery Intelligence for Electric Vehicles

paragraphList.text: SustainableEV is an intelligent EV travel assistant designed to deliver practical, real-time, and data-driven recommendations based on current battery percentage, weather, traffic conditions, and the selected route.
It consumes live data through tools to provide a structured JSON output that includes route suggestions, charging advice, and optimized travel instructions—specifically crafted for EV efficiency.
The assistant is strictly restricted from making assumptions and is trained to generate decisions solely based on the input JSON and real-time fetches from weather, traffic, and route services.
Ideal for EV route planners, fleet managers, and sustainability-focused developers, the project is fully open-source and easy to integrate with external tools and APIs.
